channel.title: Tutorial island? rep++ for who helps me!
channel.description: I want to use the tutorial island for something on my server, but you cant talk there. You can talk, but on one can see what you said. How do i make it, so ppl can talk to each other in tutorial island? the base im using is delta btw.

item.title: Tutorial island? rep++ for who helps me!
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

search Tutorial Island, and then delete the code that says that players can’t talk, or that messages won’t be shown to others.

Read full topic
item.source: Tutorial island? rep++ for who helps me!
